description.value:
You're surrounded by a palpable sense of menace and power that's terrifying to behold. The aura is a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]. An enemy that enters or ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your spell DC or class DC.

Success The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune to your Frightful Aura for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.
